userRole.description: Role each user receives when joining the guild

colors.description: Color theme of the bot (e.g. embeds)

channelName.description: Template for the voice channel names ('{}' will be replaced with channels index)
Template for the question channel names ('{}' will be replaced by the author's username)

resolveReaction.description: Name of the reaction a question's author has to give the to the answer in order to resolve the channel

deleteReaction.description: Name of the reaction a question's author has to sent into the question channel to delete it

acceptReputation.description: Amount of reputation a user receives when his message is marked as the answer

messageReputation.description: Amount of reputation a user receives when sending a message into a question channel

messageReputationTimeout.description: Duration of the timeout a user receives for receiving points by sending a message into a question channel (in ms)

askChannelRateLimit.description: Duration of the rate limit the ask-channel receives when initializing the module

roles.description: Level Roles which are assigned to a user who reaches the level

roleThresholds.description: Amount of reputation needed to reach the levels

levelUpReactionEmoji.description: Emoji of the reaction which is added to the 'level up' announcements

roleColor.description: Color of the roles (Discord Colornames allowed)

roles.description: Names of the roles which will be created
